title: Welcome Deep Terror Nami back to the Arbiters!

embed.description: Hey everyone, Welcome to the Player Behavior & Moderation board! I’d like to introduce the Arbiters, the newest branch of Riot Games’ Volunteer Program. http://i.imgur.com/zztGM1Q.png We’ve set up this group up to allow players we’ve identified as deeply knowledgeab

body:
https://yt3.ggpht.com/-gJD7eEqkI3s/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/OQQOo2OTX9Y/s900-c-k-no-mo-rj-c0xffffff/photo.jpg 

OUR FISH IS BACK IN OUR WATERS GUYS!!!!

Let's extend and a warm welcome back to one of our most vocal and supportive Summoners!!!

For those of you who aren't aware, DTN has sacrificed an enoumous amount of time here on the Boards and social media explaining and illustrating the operations of Riot's Player Behaviour Systems to fellow Summoners, shedding insights on why certain Summoners were punished by these systems as well as offering meaningful advice to avoid being punished. 

When DTN's not on the Boards, our fish assists Riot in purging the Fields of Justice of Summoners who ruin other Summoners' in-game experience.  

Our fish is indeed very productive in creating an improved player experience. :)

Give it up for Deep Terror Nami everybody!!

http://pre06.deviantart.net/1a1f/th/pre/f/2016/227/9/b/deep_sea_nami_wallpaper___1920x1080_by_aliceemad-da6ensr.png

Oh and DTN, if you're reading this, we love you!! 

https://i.gyazo.com/5d47553f1bf68dab40491afda165ff42.png 


######*Special thanks to Keyru*

replies.body: WB
I was honestly expecting a Nami sticker. Disappointed.
I didn't literally because you already used the Nami love sticker D:

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-04-06T21:48:35.020+0000)
>
> I didn't literally because you already used the Nami love sticker D:

Don't fuck it up this time.
I think that's the plan

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=00030000000000010000,timestamp=2017-04-07T00:08:52.120+0000)
>
> I think that's the plan

Hahah, I got some downvotes for that. I mean it in a friendly brotherly way to DTN.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This calls for more Nami love stickers.
Arbiters... pshh what a Joke.  Will probably get kicked out again, they are still far too toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=SailorPsycho,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-04-06T21:49:31.565+0000)
>
> Arbiters... pshh what a Joke.  Will probably get kicked out again, they are still far too toxic.

Toxic in comparison to what? I've seen Nami with a bit of sass, but usually it's well deserved. When he answers your question, and you go "well that's stupid" expect some sass.
DTN IS A GUY?!?
DTN is a fish.
~~This calls for DTN X Laughing Fish ship~~
DTN is a cat impersonating a human thought to be a fish impersonating a human
Girls don't exist on the internet

> [{quoted}](name=JarvansWAR,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2017-04-06T22:27:19.346+0000)
>
> DTN IS A GUY?!?

I always refer to people online as guys because I prefer, as a guy, to completely ignore gender as a factor when addressing someone, and because I am a guy, I default to considering all people online as guys. This is not because I don't like women, nor is it because I think any less of them, but simply because a genderless society is so much easier to address. If Deep Terror Nami told me that "he" prefers to be addressed as "she" I would gladly change my wording.
Even then, the word guy has become pretty gender neutral.  Like how I call girls dude just as often as I call boys dude.

> [{quoted}](name=Tattersall,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=00040001000000010000,timestamp=2017-04-06T22:59:34.589+0000)
>
> Even then, the word guy has become pretty gender neutral.  Like how I call girls dude just as often as I call boys dude.

Gender neutrality is what I aim for, but calling a person "it" has its own issues.

Eh, it would be time for humans to understand that they aren't worth jack, and being human doesn't make them special compared to everyone else.
EDIT: them dark ages anthropocentric downvotes

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ktAt2zeE,comment-id=0004000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-07T04:08:43.468+0000)
>
> Eh, it would be time for humans to understand that they aren't worth jack, and being human doesn't make them special compared to everyone else.

I for one am not human. I look like kog maw and smell like Urgot. I laugh like lux, and have about as many friends as Amumu. I'm about as infamous as Teemo, and I main tryndamere.

>DTN IS GARBAGE?!?

Ftfy
https://i.gyazo.com/70f6fe4ab8d0d5f370517d3a105c7780.png
See look at that. Absolutely terrible. That art is awful too.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Honestly thought DTN was always an Arbiter
There was a brief time period when our fish wasn't.
Why?

I said something unfair about Riot and the moderators (we'll leave it at that), without thinking about the repercussions due to my status as an Arbiter. I don't disagree with the decision that was made and am glad to be back.
Thought you just chose to take a break. Welcome back (did you ever really 'leave' as a helpful person?)
I considered leaving but that lasted about 2 days :P
...was out of water!
Welcome back, my friend!

Sry, there is only one Arbiter I recognize.
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/3/30/Arbiter_crop.png
Hey you're late with an april fools joke.
Better late than never.
Gotcha. Do i need to add /s whenever i make a joke to avoid downvotes?
Lol I don't know if it'll help, got a lot of haters downvoting all of us lol.
Down vote me too Kappa. Don't you dare up vote now.
https://puu.sh/vbLHP/2abcc8e82c.png

YOU DID NOT :O


*Proceeds to up vote every comment of yours*

HELL YEA

HELL YEA

HELL YEA

HELL YEA

HELL YEA

HELL YEA

<edited by Moderation due to length>
zzzzz

> our fish assists Riot in purging the Fields of Justice of Summoners who ruin other Summoners' in-game experience. 

How?
By catching the rotten fish in the sea and barbequing them.

http://i.giphy.com/1bYaHhGtueIqQ.gif

I know i'm not eating that.
{{champion:17}}

Not sure if this is the right place to ask, or an appropriate thing, but is the Arbiter program a volunteer thing? Or are you payed by Riot to do this, even possibly it being your job?

Congratulations DTN as well.

The Ariber program is a volunteer program and they're not paid for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=opVBd7rZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-28T21:09:21.428+0000)
>
> Hey everyone,
> 
> Welcome to the Player Behavior & Moderation board!  I&rsquo;d like to introduce the Arbiters, the newest branch of Riot Games Volunteer Program.  
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/zztGM1Q.png
> 
> We've set up this group up to allow players we've identified as deeply knowledgeable about our behavior systems to reach out to their fellow players, providing information and helping address questions and concerns you guys bring to our attention.
> 
> ***Arbiters are volunteers***, not Rioters, so there are some things they can't do (no pulling chat logs or lifting bans, sorry!), but they are ready and willing to help you find resources and become more familiar with Riot's player behavior policies.  If you've been warned or banned through one of our PB&J systems (LeaverBuster, report frequency warnings, etc.) or just have a question, the Arbiters are here to work with you!
